entry.title: Complexityexplorer
entry.content: Complexity Explorer delivers online courses, tutorials, and resources essential to the study of complex systems. Complexity Explorer is an educational project from the Santa Fe Institute.
entry.summary: Complexity Explorer delivers online courses, tutorials, and resources essential to the study of complex systems. Complexity Explorer is an educational project from the Santa Fe Institute.

entry.title: FreeCodeCamp
entry.content:
freeCodeCamp (also referred to as Free Code Camp) is a non-profit educational organization that consists of an interactive learning web platform, an online community forum, chat rooms, online publications and local organizations that intend to make learning software development accessible to anyone.

Beginning with tutorials that introduce students to HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, students progress to project assignments that they complete either alone or in pairs.e.
entry.summary: freeCodeCamp (also referred to as Free Code Camp) is a non-profit educational organization that consists of an interactive learning web platform, an online community forum, chat rooms, online publications and local organizations that intend to make learning software development accessible to anyone.

entry.title: Graph-statistical-mechanics
entry.content:
Project leader: Juan David de los Rios Mahecha

It seems to me that education has a two-fold function to perform in the life of man and in society: the one is utility and the other is culture. Education must enable a man to become more efficient, to achieve with increasing facility the ligitimate goals of his life.

author.name: Juan David de los Rios Mahecha

entry.summary: Project leader: Juan David de los Rios Mahecha
